create.description: Can't you find what you were looking for? Register your community!

description.tip: Introduce a description about your community, so others can discover you easily and join

workspace.tip: Start sharing your next project or iniciative of your community

welcome.title: Congratulations!

connection.sync: Your changes since {{time}} have not been saved. If the problem persist, copy somewhere else your last changes and reload the application

copy.explore: Explore what people are doing in your community
copy.propose: Propose your project, find support and collaborators
copy.work: Work in your project and expose your needs

frontpage.welcome_msg: The tool to promote your proposals in your communities

empty.contributor: Write down your needs so others can help you
empty.reader: This workspace has not published any needs yet

need.tip: This is what we need to achieve the project

create.tip: Please, start creating a new workspace.

info.link: Only people with the link can see the workspace
info.public: This workspace is visible in the community's workspace list

reminder.body_one: This workspace doesn't have a name yet!
reminder.body_two: Do you really want to discard the workspace?

welcome.tip: Not involved in anything yet? Find a community to join or create your community

set_email.success: Your email address has been saved

should_be_logged.message: Sorry! You should be logged in to do that action.

migration.email: E-mail to recover password, we all forget them!

error.unknown: Ups, something went wrong while establishing your new password, please try again.

migration.success: Congratulations! your account is now protected by your password.
migration.tip: Hi {{nick}}! We are protecting user accounts in Teem. Please, set your password:

email.required: You forgot to enter your email

error.existing_user: The username is already registered, please chose another one.

nick.pattern: Please, choose a nickname composed by letters, numbers and dots

passwordRepeat.required: You forgot to repeat the password

email.email: You did not enter your email address correctly
email.required: You forgot to enter your email

error.unknown: Ups! something went wrong while sending you the password recovery email

forgottenPassword.success: We have sent you an email to recover your password

error.authorization: We could not reestablish your password. Maybe the link has expired or you have already established your password with it.

password.pattern: Password must contain at least 8 characters
password.required: You forgot to enter a password

passwordRepeat.required: You forgot to repeat the password

error.unknown: Ups, something went wrong while establishing your new password, please try again.

recoverPassword.tip: Enter a new password for your account.

upgrading.explanation: We are working hard to improve Teem and make it useful for your communities. Upgrades bring new features and bug fixes
